title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
OB: When using code assist, the file is marked as dirtied even though no changes have been made, and the code assist functionality does not appear.
EB: If code assist has nothing to suggest, it should not mark the file as dirtied.
SR:
1. Open a file. 
2. Trigger the code assist functionality. 
3. Verify that even if no suggestions are available, the file is not marked as dirtied.
